definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a roof in Lofer, Austrian province of Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 在奧地利薩爾茨堡的勞弗爾，冰柱掛在屋頂上。

sentences.english: You love the poem by fasting, praise for the "clear skies icicle."
sentences.chinese: 遊受齋愛其詩，贊爲“晴空冰柱”。

sentences.english: Arrhizus icicles hanging the Shek Pik condensate, sparkling under the sunlight, is very cute.
sentences.chinese: 石壁凝掛根根冰柱，陽光照射下晶瑩剔透，甚是可愛。

sentences.english: Icicles are formed when water dripping from an object freezes, forming long, tapered spikes.
sentences.chinese: 冰柱是由從物體上滴下來，凍結成長錐狀的水形成的。

sentences.english: She said passion should thaw the icicles in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 她說，她的熱情定會融化他心中的冰柱。

sentences.english: They are usually found in the Antarctic when saline water is introduced to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 這種死亡冰柱通常在南極洲鹽水導入海洋時出現。

sentences.english: It is common for heavy icicles to bring down power and telephone wires after an ice storm.
sentences.chinese: 是很常見的重型冰柱，以降低電力和電話線後，冰暴。

sentences.english: As the hot steam condenses on the edges, it refreezes and forms icicles.
sentences.chinese: 而高溫蒸汽亦會在邊緣處凝結，從而形成冰柱。

sentences.english: When the seawater freezes as it comes into contact with the brinicle.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的海水一接觸到這條死亡冰柱就會馬上凍結。

sentences.english: Icicles hang from a porch roof in the northeast of Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲佛蒙特州東北部，冰柱掛於門廊屋頂上。

sentences.english: Icicles hang from tree braches in winter.
It is a lot more sponge like than normal ice.
sentences.chinese: 這種冰柱比正常的冰塊看起來更像海綿。

sentences.english: He climbed to the top of the pole and knocked off the icicles.
sentences.chinese: 他爬上柱子頂端把冰柱敲掉了。

definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
